<a id="AnimationNodeOutput"></a>

# AnimationNodeOutput

**Inherits:** [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

The animation output node of an [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A node created automatically in an [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md) that outputs the final animation.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
